info.title: Template App
info.description:
The Template App API enables users and shops to interact with each other through a variety of endpoints. 

- Users can browse shops, view shop details and services, make reservations, and rate shops. 
- Shops can create an account for their shop, add services, create reservation plans, and more. 

This API provides users and shops with a way to connect and engage with each other. It is designed to be simple, user-friendly, and efficient.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Template App

patch.description: adds the given shop to favorites
removes te given shop from favorites

post.description: fetches services of the kind provided in a store sent as data
searches services with the given data

get.description: fetches all coupons from a shop

post.description: searches a coupon with the given data from a shop

gender.description: 0 = prefer not to say, 1 = male, 2 = female, 3 = other
